OnBoardDesc1: Explore hidden treasures around you, from serene parks to vibrant cultural hotspots. We curate personalized recommendations for must-visit locations nearby.
OnBoardDesc2: Learn the rich history behind every destination. With just a tap, dive deep into stories of the past that shaped the places you visit.
OnBoardDesc3: Craft your perfect travel itinerary. Set your travel goals, add places to your wishlist, and plan your next trip effortlessly.
OnBoardDesc4: Book tickets for your favorite destinations directly from the app. Hassle-free planning, all in one place.
Description: Discover the world with ease and make every journey unforgettable.Whether you're planning your next adventure or just exploring nearby spots
DiscovertheworldwithEverySignIn: Discover the world with Every Sign In.
forgotdesc: Please provide your email address to receive a confirmation code and reset your password
resetpass: Choose a new password that you haven’t used before for added security.
bookwithusandgetamazingdeals: Book with us and get amazing Deals!!
PrivacyPara1: We collect data to provide you with a personalized and seamless travel experience. This includes your name, email, phone number, and profile picture for account management and communication. Your travel preferences, such as destinations, budgets, and wishlists, allow us to offer tailored recommendations. Location data, which you can customize via device settings, helps suggest nearby attractions. Usage data, app interactions, and device information improve app performance and compatibility. Payment details, securely managed by trusted third-party processors, facilitate transactions. Additionally, communication records and data from connected services, such as social media or booking platforms, enhance integration. All data is handled responsibly with robust security measures to ensure your privacy.
PrivacyPara2: We use your personal data to provide tailored travel recommendations, manage your account, and enhance your app experience. This includes personalizing trip plans, suggesting nearby attractions, processing secure transactions, improving app functionality, and integrating with connected services. All data is handled responsibly to ensure your privacy and security.
PrivacyPara3: We share your personal data only with trusted partners, such as payment processors, travel service providers, and analytics platforms, to deliver and improve app services. Data is shared securely and solely for necessary purposes, ensuring compliance with legal obligations and safeguarding your privacy.
